data.message: Celebrating love and joy on our 6th Anniversary. "Growing together" is the most beautiful feeling. A big thank you to my lovely team Priya Kamble, Vishal Gharat, Purnima Awasthi and Hemant Kedar and all my friends and family who have always supported us in many ways. Also a big thank you to all our followers and clients who believe in our work and keep us motivated. :) Love you all. <3
Join the fun hands on workshop and make the most of your Sunday!

NWWA supplements the efforts of the Indian Navy in areas of community welfare and environment awareness. Earthoholics is happy to be associated with NWWA for such noble causes. Our team enjoyed as much as the excited kids.

One of RUR's sustainable solid waste management sites, Fortune Heights, Mahim is an example of how biodegradable waste from residential complexes can be composted and used for organically growing vegetables on city rooftops. Kitchen garden installed and supervised by Team Earthoholics, contact queries@earthoholics.org
Have some boring space outside your office or shop? We help you green your space! Contact: 9833251324 or email : queries@earthoholics.org
A private terrace beautified with Organic Veggies!
Love plants but you are short on space? Worry not, we use the tiniest space and build mini green corners for you! Contact 9833251324 or queries@earthoholics.org

Its amazing when you have responsible Builders of housing societies like Arkade Group, who give so much importance to community gardening and allot dedicated space for Organic Kitchen Gardening. A comprehensive set up by Earthoholics to ensure residents get the freshest produce!
Organic Kitchen Gardening Workshop
Terrarium and Bottle Gardening
Terrarium and Bottle Gardening

Ornamental Gardening Workhsop:-
Register by sending an sms with your full name and email id on 9833251324. Join now, limited seats!

.This workshop is best for all those who love flowers, indoor plants and other ornamental plants.

This workshop covers the following:
Principles & elements of landscape designing.
Choosing plants and types of all ornamental plants.
Various features of landscape garden. (Hedges, edges, arches, flower beds, ground covers, lawns etc.)
Indoor gardening. (Indoor foliage plants, planting media, plant care)
Plant propagation methods. (Cutting, layering, grafting, budding, seed sowing, bulbs & tubers etc.)
Medicinal plants garden/ herb garden/ grandma’s pouch concept.

Timing: 11 am to 3pm.  Fees: 1500/-  (Includes mini propagation kit and snacks.)

Register by sending an sms with your full name and email id on 9833251324. Join now, limited seats!

Learn to make and care for your Miniature Gardens!

Terrarium and Dish Garden's Workshop ( Miniature Gardening)

This is the most exciting hands on workshop, which helps you learn the beautiful art of Terrarium Gardening.
Terrariums are the best personalized living green gifts.

The workshop covers the following:
Basics of Terrarium Making
Plant selection and introduction to each and every plant and its light requirements.
Different types of Terrariums ( open and closed)
Material and tools needed.
Assembly
Hands on Making of Bottle Garden in a glass bottle.
Hands on Making of Dry Terrarium - 8 inch 
Demonstration on Dish Garden
Demonstration on Broken pot fairy garden

Timing: 11 am to 3 pm. 
Fees: 2500/- (Includes material for making terrarium, bottle garden and snacks.)

To Register send a sms with your full name and email Id to 9833251324

Focused on Organic Kitchen Gardening at home, window grills balconies or terraces. Home Composting in simple easy steps. 

Workshop covers the following:
Understanding Sunlight and seasons
Choosing the right vegetables 
All about soil, pots and manure
Seed Sowing, transplanting and care.
Special tips for the rainy season
Trellis Making 

What is Home Composting 
Step by step guide to composting
Trouble shooting 
Types of composting Bio / Vermi composting
Community composting

Hands on Seed Sowing, Demo on Transplanting,

Post workshop all can successfully grow their own organic vegetables and start composting their kitchen waste to make the best plant manure.

Timing: 11 am to 3pm. Fees: 2000/- (Includes starter kit and snacks.)

Yet another organisation realises the importance of cultivating green hobbies . Kudos to ACG Inspection Systems Pvt. Ltd. for hosting the Organic Kitchen Gardening workshop.

A beautiful "Mom & I- Gardening workshop" at the Navy Wives Welfare Association Ghatkopar. Great participation and interest expressed by the moms and kids. Cheers NWWA!

Register by sending an sms with your full name and email id on 9833251324. Join now, limited seats!

           This is a half day workshop with a field visit to the nearest garden.This workshop is best for all those who love flowers, indoor plants and other ornamental plants.

This workshop covers the following:
Principles & elements of landscape designing.
Choosing plants and types of all ornamental plants.
Various features of landscape garden. (Hedges, edges, arches, flower beds, ground covers, lawns etc.)
Indoor gardening. (Indoor foliage plants, planting media, plant care)
Plant propagation methods. (Cutting, layering, grafting, budding, seed sowing, bulbs & tubers etc.)
Medicinal plants garden/ herb garden/ grandma’s pouch concept.


Timing: 11 am to 3pm.  Fees: 1500/-  (Includes mini propagation kit and snacks.)

Installation Ceremony of RUR’s Green Gold BioComposters at Cypress Society, Mulund. 

This 180 flats society has been segregating waste, and has now installed RGGCs to compost their wet waste following the nature’s method of recycling.

#recycle #wetwaste #compost #naturesmagi

Congratulations RUR: Are you Reducing, Reusing, Recycling. for geting GreenPro Certified by CII under Innovation Category!

Mrs. Monisha Narke, Founder and CEO of RUR Greenlife felicitated at IGBC Green Awards, Jaipur.

RUR’s green feature in India Today - Mumbai, a Monthly city magazine! 

Let’s become Green Warriors, and protect our Mother Earth

#wastemanagement #gogreen #naturalcomposting #tumblers
Session 2
Webinar on Solid Waste Management

Happy to share that RUR's Green Gold Biocomposter for recycling wet waste to nutrient rich compost was inaugurated in the presence of Mr. Anand Wagaralkar, Deputy Municipal Commissioner, Zone 2 and Keshav Ubale, Assistant Commissioner, F/S Ward on Swacch Bharat Divas in Kalpataru Harmony, a 29 member society located at Sion

Kalpataru Harmony begun their journey in Feb 2017 and has obtained 3 batches of high quality nutrient rich compost.

RUR’s Green Gold BioComposters all set to manage wet waste in a 65 flats society, Matoshree’s Pearl in Mahim!

The systems were inaugurated on 2nd October, Swacch Bharat Divas. This was followed by a training session for housekeeping staff, and residents to become Green Champions!

Wonders of Bio Composting! To know more on how you can join the green revolution and start bio composting in your home/society/school/office write to us RUR Greenlife at info@rur.co.in.
#greengold#biocompostin#recycling

Our exhibit organised by the BMC on Technologies of Waste Segregation and Treatment under the Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan has been extended till tomorrow.

Timings - 10am to 3pm
Venue - NSCI, Worli

You all are coordially invited. 🍃

RUR's exhibit on Technologies of Waste Segregation and Treatment under the Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan! 
Honoured to meet Shri Amitabh Bachchan, Shri Devendra Fadnavis, Shri Ajoy Mehta, and Shri Uddhav Thackeray, dignitaries pioneering the green message!

Happy to share that we are participating in an exhibition organised by the BMC on Technologies of Waste Segregation and Treatment under the Swachh Bharat Abhiyaan on the 1st, 2nd & 3rd of September, 2017 at The Dome, NSCI.

Please find the updated timings.

The Chief Guest will be the Chief Minister, Shri Devendra Fadnavis and the Guests of Honour will be Shri Amitabh Bachhan and Shri Ratan Tata, and they will be pioneering this green message.

Happy to share that RUR Greenlife is now GreenPro certified!

"RUR Greenlife has met the requirements of GreenPro standard for a product under ‘Innovation’ category and qualifies for GreenPro certification. This is an excellent accomplishment and we would like to congratulate you and the entire team on this success.", K S Venkatagiri,
Executive Director, CII-Godrej GBC, Hyderabad
